        public static void waitForElementPresent(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,

                                         java.lang.String locatorValue,
                                         int timeOutInSec,
                                         java.lang.String msg)
        Finds the element by the given locatorType and locatorValue and waits for the element to be visible.
        Parameters:
        driver - : Webdriver
        locatorType - : how the element to be looked up (CSS or Xpath)
        locatorValue - : the address of the element
        timeOutInSec: - the maximum wait time in seconds
        msg - : timeout error message
